CustomField.formula: Board_4x_year__c + Board_conflict_of_interest__c + Board_gov_and_fin_committees__c + Board_member_independence__c + Board_minutes__c + Board_term_limits__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Totals 6 of 7 criteria for benchmarks about governing boards. (Board-6 or more members applies to Sustaining but not Exploring benchmark)
CustomField.label: Board benchmark tally
